subcategory_lists.title: Green Building Development
subcategory_lists.description: Companies that design, construct, redevelop, or retrofit properties that meet reputable green building certification standards. Green building certification standards verify that a building has met certain environmental, energy, human health, and other standards in its design, construction, and operation.
subcategory_lists.title_kr: 녹색 건설 개발: 친환경 건물 개발 및 운영
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 환경친화적인 건물 설계, 시공, 개발, 개조를 하는 기업들. 친환경 건물 인증 기준을 충족하는지 확인한다.

subcategory_lists.title: Green Building Management
subcategory_lists.description: Companies that manage and/or operate buildings that have obtained a green certification.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 녹색 인증을 획득한 건물을 운영하는 회사들.

subcategory_lists.title: Green Building Technologies & Materials
subcategory_lists.description: Companies that provide products/services that increase the energy efficiency of residential, commercial, or public buildings. This includes products/services such as insulation and building envelopes, controls and displays for heating, cooling, lighting and home automation, HVAC, energy management services, windows, doors, elevators, etc.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 건물의 에너지 효율을 높이는 제품과 서비스를 제공하는 기업들. 절연재, 건축외피, 난방, 냉방, 조명 및 홈 자동화를 위한 제어장치, 에너지 관리 서비스, 창문, 문, 엘리베이터 등을 포함한다.
